attributes.action: Stop Tour Operators & Travel Companies putting prices up during school holidays
attributes.additional_details: Look in any brochure or on any website and you will clearly be able to see when the school holidays are as the prices are I hiked up. I worked in the travel industry for 16 years and it's got worse every year.
attributes.background: It wrong that tour companies and travel companies can put there holidays up by so much during school holidays, parents can't take children out during term time but are being priced out of being able to go away during the school holidays. It's not fair and something needs to be done to stop it.
